text: Erminio Piserchia (born 12 January 1964) is a retired Italian-Swiss football defender and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Concordia Basel players Category:Grasshopper Club Zürich players Category:FC Laufen players Category:FC St. Gallen players Category:FC Lugano players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Swiss football managers Category:BSC Young Boys managers
title: Erminio Piserchia
